tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_humidity_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP
);
